alert.note: Alert for Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Manatee and northwestern Sarasota Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Sarasota, or near Sarasota, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sarasota, Bradenton, Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota Springs, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Sarasota Bradenton Airport, West Samoset, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, Myakka River State Park, The Meadows, Ridge Wood Heights, South Bradenton, South Sarasota, Kensington Park, Vamo and Desoto Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
